Description.Text: The hotel, as part of the Ruby Hotels, stands for "Lean Luxury",affordable accommodation in the city centre and a great modern vibe.

The hotel is situated in right on Mariahilfer Strasse,Vienna's largest shopping street in the lively 7th district.The hotel is located in the renovated former Stafa department store, only a few steps away from shopping, cultural sights, cafes and bars and the metro as well as the Westbahnhof station.
Breakfast is available at this property.
This accommodation has a medium lobby.
